input_text:
Job Title: Marketing Content Creator

Location: New Hope, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Writing/Editing

Description:
Why Tenna?We take pride that our roots are in the construction industry. With this experience and knowledge, we have built a platform that revolutionizes construction equipment fleet operations. We provide innovative solutions to customers looking for competitive ways to better manage and track their assets such as heavy and light equipment, large fleets, tools, and materials.  At Tenna, we believe the best is right in front of all of us, and that each day holds more potential than the one before. We believe that every new discovery can lead to something better than we thought possible. When we boil it down, the top five qualities that define the Tenna Team are quality-obsessed, gritty, continuous learners, collaborative problem solvers, and just plain awesome. Sound like you? Join us as we empower our customers to control their mixed assets anytime, anywhere, on one comprehensive platform. 
Position DescriptionTenna is searching for a Marketing Content Creator to be the driving force behind our engaging and compelling content across diverse marketing channels. As a Marketing Content Creator, you will play a pivotal role in our customer’s journey, developing strategies that resonate with our brand objectives and target audience preferences. Crafting captivating headlines, clear copy, and visually stunning content, you'll script, shoot, and produce short-form marketing videos, create infographics, social media graphics, animations, conduct e-mail marketing and more. Taking full ownership of content creation, you'll manage the end-to-end process, from creation to posting and measurement across all social media channels and forums. If you're a creative thinker with a passion for storytelling, driving engagement, and shaping impactful marketing content that drives results - Apply now!
NOTE: To be considered for this role, applicants must provide a portfolio for review.
Your ResponsibilitiesDevelops engaging and compelling content across various marketing channels, including blogs, social media, email campaigns, website copy, advertising materials, etc.Collaborates with the marketing team to brainstorm, plan, and execute content strategies that align with brand objectives and target audience preferencesCrafts compelling headlines and captions, writes clear and concise copy and ensures content adheres to brand voice and style guidelinesCreates high-quality, visual, and engaging content (e.g., infographics, social media graphics, animations, interactive elements, and presentations). Scripts, shoots, and produces short-form marketing videosTakes full ownership and responsibility for content creation (written, graphic, and media), uploading, posting, measurement, and moderation/participation across all social media channels and forums, including LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Twitter/X, Instagram, and others as neededMonitors and analyzes content performance metrics, including website traffic, social media engagement, email open rates, video views, click-through rates, and conversions, to measure effectiveness and identify areas for improvementAssists with content creation (presentations, brochures, etc.) and other marketing/sales collateral upon request. Assists with final content formatting using InDesign templates, PPT templates, etc.Assists with coordinating and administrating traditional and digital advertising campaigns, as well as one-off requests for trade publications, associations, etc.Assists with various sales and marketing projectsLeads the content creation and execution for email outreach or other sales or event-driven communications content upon requestCreates blog, news, and newsletter content based on calendar/assignmentsManages digital content calendars, schedules, and workflows to ensure timely delivery and distribution of content across relevant digital channelsCollaborates with Partner Marketing and supports all speakership proposals, speakership presentations, partner marketing support, etc., alongside the Content Marketing ManagerAssists with creating and distributing press releases based on strategy and newsworthy eventsAssists with press release pitching and networking among associations and other partnershipsPrioritizes deadlines to meet marketing and sales team goals effectively. Assists in successfully implementing the sales and marketing plan and achieving the company's goalsStays updated on emerging content formats, technologies, marketing trends, social media trends, industry regulations, and best practices to continuously innovate and enhance content strategy while maintaining compliance
Qualifications5+ years’ experience in Marketing content creation roles5+ years of experience writing, editing, and finalizing content related to social media, blog and news content, website content, presentations, e-mail marketing, etcBachelor’s Degree in a related field is required or equivalent work experienceExperience with B2B content creation (technology or construction industry a plus)Experience with design tools and Adobe Suite programs such as InDesign, Photoshop, and IllustratorExperience with Salesforce and HubSpot or similar programsStrong creative writing and copywriting skills. Experienced in understanding what and how audiences consume content and creating it accordinglyExperience staying informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging content formats to ensure content and strategy remain relevant and innovative.Solid computer skills (MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.)Experience using narratives and storytelling to build loyalty and awareness among target marketsExperience collaborating cross-functionally with varying departments, such as Engineering, Product, Customer Success, Sales, BD/Partnerships, etc., and a broader marketing team to create contentExperience learning and understanding ideal customer profiles and needs to deliver high-value marketing solutionsExperience working diligently and independently, but according to direction and within pre-set guidelinesExperience using AI tools for generative content, content planning, and distribution
Benefits, Perks, & Additional Information:Full-time opportunityLocation: Hybrid in New Hope, PA, or remote East CoastTravel is required, up to 10%Competitive compensation packageRobust, low-cost benefit packages offeredBenefit coverage begins on the first date of employment401k matchEmployee referral bonusesDependent Care offered

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Marketing Content Creator
output_json.summary: Tenna is seeking a Marketing Content Creator to develop engaging content across various marketing channels.
